## serialization.workspaceComments.append() function

Appends the comment defined by the given state to the given workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function append(state: State, workspace: Workspace, { recordUndo }?: {
    recordUndo?: boolean;
}): WorkspaceComment;
```
